article_title: Just Three Years Later, President Seeks To Expand Obamacare Tax On Business Owners

article_metadata.description: As part of President Obama's signature legislation -- the Affordable Care Act, or as it's affectionately or derisively known, depending on your point of view, "Obamacare" --  a brand spankin' new tax was born on January 1, 2013. The tax took aim at the wealthiest 2% of taxpayer by imposing an [...]
